titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any major health care reform bill considered on the floor should be available for viewing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 7/14/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any major health care reform bill that comes to the floor of the House in final form should be available to Members to view in hard copy for a week prior to the final vote.
